product.productName: Taylors of Harrogate Yorkshire 80 tea bags -
product.productDescription: Rainforest Alliance certified. Bringing you a proper brew. We go to great lengths to make tea properly - from tasting 1000s of teas a day to find the best for our blend, to thinking about the water you'll brew it with at home. And over the years, we've built relationships with some of the world's top tea estates and gardens, visiting them in person as much as possible. But working closely with our suppliers is about more than quality tea. It's about trading with a conscience, doing business in a way that respects people and planet. By Appointment to HRH The Prince of Wales Suppliers of Beverages, Taylors of Harrogate North Yorkshire. Find out more at www.yorkshiretea.co.uk. We are a member of Ethical Tea Partnership. Rainforest Alliance Certified\u2122. Minimum 70% Certified Tea. This product includes teas from Rainforest Alliance Certified\u2122 farms. For more information, visit www.rainforest-alliance.org. Help us to save the rainforest. Help us to save a Yorkshire-sized area of rainforest by collecting these tokens. For every four you save, 50p goes to our Yorkshire Rainforest Project. Send your tokens to: Yorkshire Tea,. Admail 819,. Harrogate,. HG1 1AZ. How do you brew? What's best - a pot or a mug? A stir or a squeeze? Milk in first or last? Find us on Facebook and let us know!

product.productName: Waitrose Rich and Intense Italian Red -
product.productDescription: Produce Of Italy. 2011. From th Puglia Region of Italy. The taste.... Bold, fruity and robust, with lots of juicy blueberry and black cherry flavours and a hint of iquorice. Made from.... A blend of Nero de Troia, Primitivo and Montepulciano grapes.

product.productName: Waitrose Crisp and Floral Italian White -
product.productDescription: Produce of Italy. The taste.... Fresh, zesty and aromatic, with bright, clean flavours of apple, pear and melon. Made from.... A blend of Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc and MÃ¼ller Thurgau grapes.

product.productName: Waitrose Chilean Dry White Vibrant and Grassy -
product.productDescription: The taste.... Crisp, clean and fresh as a daisy, with fruity goosberry and citruss flavours. made from ....Juicy Sauvignon Blanc and Chardonnay grapes, grown in Chile's sunny central Valley.
Rich, supple and full-bodied red with raspberry and spice aromas. Try with a chunk of Italian cheese.

The taste....A rich, fruity red, bursting with blackberryand cherry flavours,with a hint of warm black pepper. Made from .... A blend of Shiraz and a touch of Grenache grapes. Good with.... Red meats and hearty rustic stews and casseroles.
Soft, fresh easy-drinking cava from a well-respected producer. A great wine to serve at parties.

Wine of Italy. Pinot Grigio - White Italian Wine. The One-Liner. Well-made, versatile, Pinot Grigio. Tasting Note. A fresh, dry white with gentle floral and citrus aromas. Crisp and delicate on the palate with lightly honeyed fruit balanced by lemony acidity and a fresh, dry finish. In the Vineyard. Produced from selected Pinot Grigio grapes grown on hillside vineyards in Northern Italy. The grapes were hand harvested during the first 2 weeks of September. In the Winery. The grapes were crushed and gently pressed and the juice allowed to settle and clarify before cool fermentation at 16 to 18C in temperature controlled stainless steel tanks. The wine was bottled young after a period of 3 to 6 months ageing on fine lees in stainless steel tanks. Producer Details. Set up in 2003, Adria Vini is a winemaking venture jointly owned by Boutinot and Araldica Vini Piemontesi, the leading co-operative in Piemonte. All areas of production, from grape selection through to vinification, maturation, blending and bottling are meticulously overseen by Araldica's Claudio Manera and Lella Burdese. Working closely with growers and cooperatives, our aim is to produce a range of authentic, well priced wines from local grape varieties. The mainstay of white wine production is Pinot Grigio, sourced from the Pavia region south of Milan, Fruili and the Veneto, with the addition of Prosecco, and Grillo and Catarratto wines from Sicily. The reds come from mature, low yielding vineyards in Sicily,Puglia and Abruzzo, the source of some of Europe's most undervalued and characterful wines. Our most recent project has brought Cannonau and Vermentino from Sardinia to the portfolio. Award&Press. 2009 Vintage: December Wine Awards 2010 - Bronze. 2009 Vintage:""Citrus aromas, fresh and tangy pears with a zesty, grassy edge. Nice acidity, well made.""Decanter world Wine Awards Judges Comments, Decanter Magazine, October 2010. 2008 Vintage:""Happy-go-lucky holiday pinot grigio with sufficient leafy, lemony, spicy fruit to keep everyone smiling.""Jane Macquitty, The Times 15th august 2009

A smooth, juicy medium -bodied wine full of ripe blackberry, plum and subtle spice. Lingering, soft and balanced. Fish Hoek is based on the simple philosophy of one single grape variety and the relaxed lifestyle of Cape Town. Riebeek Cellars was founded in 1941 by descendants of the Huguenots who had originally settled in Franschoek. The cellar is a private co-operative with 1500 hectares under vine with 60% of fruit production graded as either premium or ultra premium. The winemaking for this Shiraz is overseen by Bruce Jack at Riebeek Cellars in Swartland. This cooler-climate region not far from Cape Town is 'up-and-coming' and home to many admired vineyards. The grapes for Fishhoek Shiraz were cold soaked overnight and fermented in stainless steel to retain fruit freshness before being aged in French oak barrels for 12 months for spice, complexity and texture. Recently awarded the title of Wine Personality of the Year at the Financial Mail Wine Business Awards, Bruce Jack is one of South Africa's biggest movers and shakers making distinctive, stylish wines.
Sparkling vanilla flavour soft drink with vegetable extracts. For more information on this product log on to www.coca-cola.co.uk

Perfect for staying hydrated throughout the day. Born in the pristine heights of the French Alps, each and every droplet starts as rain or snow and filters for a minimum of 15 years through natural layers of glacial rock. Untouched by man, Evian is as pure as pure can be. evian - Live young

Carbonated Indian tonic water.

product.productName: Robinsons no added sugar fruit & barley orange squash -
product.productDescription: Single concentrate. Juice from concentrate. No added sugars - contains naturally occurring sugars. Artificial sweeteners. No artificial colours or flavours. Suitable for vegetarians. Concentrated low calorie orange soft drink with barley, with sweeteners. Fruit&Barley. Made with real juice blended with barley in a special way that only we know how, for a deliciously smooth taste. Only we know how to make it so smooth

product.productName: Tropicana smooth orange juice, no bits -
product.productDescription: 100% pure squeezed fruit. Not from concentrate. 5 a day. Juice squeezed from 100% fresh oranges. 5 a Day. 150ml of Tropicana Pure Premium provides one of your daily portions of fruit and vegetables. Our Smooth Orange. We plant over three million orange trees every year. Only after six years do our trees produce their sweetest most succulent fruit, good enough to be squeezed into Tropicana. At the peak of juicy ripeness, we hand pick, check and gently squeeze the oranges for a sweet, zesty, golden-fresh taste. 60 Years of Passion and Dedication... Since the day we squeezed our first orange over 60 years ago we have strived to make the best tasting juice possible. We nurture our orange trees from seedlings, pick all the fruit by hand and select only the finest to be squeezed, before tasting each pressing to make sure it is just right. Each fruit is special and the juice inside it precious. We believe that the juice you drink should taste delicious; like you're biting into the fruit itself, with nothing added and nothing taken away. A Choice of Tropicana Juices... Orange: Hand-picked and gently squeezed... Enjoy Smooth, Original and Extra Juicy Bits. Classics: Single fruit varieties... familiar juice in its finest form. Orange Creations: Our classic pure premium orange with an exciting twist. Exotic Creations: Fruit from around the world, bringing you a taste of the tropics. Why not Try... Pink Grapefruit. Classic grapefruit sour notes balanced with a gentle sweetness create a pleasant yet bracing citrus taste. Red Grape. Deliciously sweet 100% pure pressed grape juice. Respecting our Environment. At Tropicana we rely on the environment and have a respect for nature. We work hard to ensure we are looking after our world and we believe that by doing so we will continue to get top quality fruit for our juice. We strive to do all we can to reduce our impact on the environment so everyone can benefitfrom it. To find out more visit www.Tropicana.co.uk/Environment
Refreshing carbonated soda water.
Natural mineral water

product.productName: Essential Waitrose orange juice with bits -
product.productDescription: Orange Juice From Concentrate with Bits

It's because our orange juice is squeezed from hand-picked oranges that it's so very, very juicy and very, very refreshing. We promise that our orange juice will always be refreshingly innocent because it is never concentrated and never sweetened. Not now, not ever.

On sweeping alluvial plains formed by the great Murray River Basin, nature's rich sun-drenched vineyards and leaping kangaroos perfectly co-exist in this wondrous habitat. This is the essence of our landscape in South Eastern Australia embodied in our perfectly well-balanced fine wines, ^yellow tail]. The Shiraz bounds forward from the glass with berry and vanilla oak aromas. Subdued earthy tones with soft ripe sweetness are displayed in perfect harmony with fine tannins.

Made with real juice blended with barley in a special way that only we know how, for a deliciously smooth taste. Only we know how to make it so smooth.
Almond and peach flavours dominate this delicate Pinot Grigio from cool hillside vineyards. Ideal apÃ©ritif.

Since 1843 Lindemans has consistently released award winning wines. Our winemakers have carefully crafted this special release wine to represent their personal expression of Lindemans winemaking.As a true expression of LINDEMANSÂ®winemakers' skill, these special release wines combine elegant structure with classical fruit notes. This Winemakers Release Shiraz Cabernet is a full-bodied, well balanced wine with rich fruit flavours.

Wine of France. Arnaud de Lassalle - White French Wine. Benedictine monks first planted vines at Pouilly-sur-Loire on slopes overlooking the upper reaches of the Loire river. Today, there are over 1,200 hectares of vineyards. Pouilly FumÃ©is exclusively made from the Sauvignon Blanc grape and, on this region's particular soils, it produces crisp, dry, elegant whites with aromatic grassy notes and a smoky, mineral character. The special microclimate of Pouilly helps the grapes to retain a beautiful freshness when fully mature and gives Pouilly-FumÃ©its crisp, pure style. Tasting note - Delicate aromas of freshly cut grass and blackcurrant leaf follow through to a crisp, dry and fresh palate, with green apple and gooseberry notes. Long mineral finish.
This smooth and sultry Fairtrade and Organic red really hits the spot. Enjoy with a shepherd's pie.
Crisp, fresh, Fairtrade white from Argentina's most individual grape. Enjoy this wine with fish.

product.productName: Torres Las Mulas Cabernet Sauvignon RosÃ© Central Valley, Chile -
product.productDescription: Meticulously crafted from organic grapes, with voluptuous character. Brilliant with Asian flavours.

EST 1822. RESERVE PORT MADE EXCLUSIVELY FROM ORGANICALLY GROWN GRAPES. Fonseca's Terra Prima port is a full bodied reserve blend made form grapes produced from organic farming in the Cima Corgo area of the Douro Valley. The spirit used to fortify this port was also produced from organically grown grapes. Fonseca has over a decade of experience in organic viticulture in the Douro Valley and was one of the first port houses to develop and apply organic methods in its vineyards. Aged to maturity in oak vats, Fonseca's Terra Prima expresses the natural fruity richness of the traditional Douro Valley grape varieties. CONTROLLED BY SOCERT PORTUGAL. Port produced from organically grown grapes. 20% vol.

product.productName: Joseph Drouhin Puligny- Montrachet Premier Cru Burgundy, France -
product.productDescription: Wine of Puligny-Montrachet FolatiÃ¨res, France. Puligny-Montrachet FolatiÃ¨res - White French Wine. Located in the heart of historical Beaune, France, Joseph Drouhin, with its magnificent cellars and vast vineyard holdings, offers all the great Burgundy Appellations. This wine, as well as all the others that bear the name Joseph Drouhin, illustrates the same exacting commitment to tradition, authenticity and excellence.
Hauntingly peachy, aromatic Viognier made from organically-grown grapes. Delicious with prawns or scallops.
Elegant, ripe, oak-aged Shiraz made from organically-grown fruit. Lovely with gammon.

Wine of Chile. Organic wine. Sauvignon Blanc - White Chilean Wine. ""Fresh notes of white flowers and green apple with a smooth, delicate palate."". In Chile's Central Valley, between the Pacific and the Andes mountains, 'Las Mulas is born. This wine, made by the Torres Family, comes from certified organic vineyards where viticultural methods respect the environment. This wine is part of a range of wines from Torres Chile that are made from organically farmed grapes. The grapes come from a 40 hectares property called \u2018San Luis Alico\u2019 in San Clemente owned by the Torres family, where free-roaming animals assist the fertilisation of the soil.
Supremely well-made Pomerol with rich plummy fruit and smoky oak. Makes a feast with roast lamb.
Organic red with vibrant blueberry flavours and moreish, soft style. Serve with bruschetta or pizza.

Wine of Portugal. Organically farmed vineyard. Douro - Red Portuguese Wine. The Symington Family's Assares vineyard in the Vilarica valley was granted organic certification in 2006. Just 42,000 bottles of Altano red wine of unique character were produced from these organically farmed grapes at the 2008 harvest.

Wine of California, USA. Made with organic grapes. Merlot - Red Californian Wine. Cherry, blackberry and plum aromas. French oak barrel ageing accentuates layers of chocolate, leading to a soft, complex, velvety finish. Bonterra was founded on a philosophy that farming organically produces the purest, most flavourful fruit. This holistic approach balances the land and surrounding habitat of wasps, birds and wildlife to produce wines of unmatched flavour and distinction. Robert Blue, Winemaker

Suitable for vegans&vegetarians. Monastrell - Syrah - Red Spanish Wine. A fantastically smooth blend which offers black cherry and plum aromas on the nose followed by rich flavours of red fruits and mocha on the palate. ""Heredad Del Rey is an intense blend of Monastrell and Syrah varietals offering exciting aromas of black fruit and cinnamon. Aged 12 months in oak barrel, it has developed a smooth texture rich in plum and morello cherry flavours with a touch of black pepper on the finish. A medium bodied wine, Heredad Del Rey Monastrell-Syrah goes fantastically well with paella, spicy tapas and mature cheddar"".
Delicious organic red with juicy red and black fruit flavours. Serve with chickpea couscous.

Wine of California, USA. Made with organic grapes. Chardonnay - White Californian Wine. Aromas of apple and citrus, with flavours of cinnamon. Subtle barrel ageing in French oak to add a touch of vanilla creaminess. Bonterra was founded on a philosophy that farming organically produces the purest, most flavourful fruit. This holistic approach balances the land and surrounding habitat of wasps, birds and wildlife to produce wines of unmatched flavour and distinction.
Classic cassis and cedar flavours from organically grown grapes. Natural partner for moussaka.

Wine of Chile. Made with organically grown grapes. Cabernet Sauvignon - Red Chilean Wine. ""Exquisite notes of dark berries on a base of licorice with a silky, elegant finish."". In the Chile's Central Valley, between the Pacific and the and mountains, 'Las Mulas' is born. This wine, made by the Torres Family, comes from certified organic vineyards where viticultural methods respect the environment.
A silky, supple red full of cherry and redcurrant fruit and a refreshing finish
Made From the Sauvignon Blanc grape, Sancerre Blanc from the Loire is famous for its elegant bouquet and its crisp dry finish.

product.productName: Frog's Leap Zinfandel Napa Valley California -
product.productDescription: Dramatically rich blackcherry aromas lead in to sweet plum flavours. Luxurious with rich tomato dishes.
Smooth but powerful Southern French red with character from old vines. Pair with rich tomato-based dishes.
Premium red de-alcoholized wine. A grape beverage with other natural flavors.

Wine of Spain. Muscat - De-Alcoholised White Spanish Wine. De-alcoholised wine for everyone who would like to enjoy the pleasures of the earth with all of its taste and a minimum of alcohol. Only 0.5Â°alcohol content and fewer than half the calories of a conventional white wine. Varietal: Made with Muscat grapes. Winemaking: Two weeks fermentation in stainless steel vats at a temperature of 14-16Â°C. Tasting Notes: Pale yellow, very clean and sharp. Rich and fresh floral aromas of green apples, peaches and citrics. Fresh and bright on the palate.

Wine of France. Viognier-Sauvignon Blanc - White French Wine. The Paul Mas vineyards are located in the Laguedoc region of South of France, and are planted on the hillsides of the 5 best wine-producing valleys of the region. Jean-Claude Mas's Expertise and passion for his region results in this Viognier - Sauvignon Blanc blend, a marriage between tow very distinct families of savours and structures that create a complex wine with character. The mouth is rich and fresh, it reveals a quintessence of peach, apricot and gooseberry aromas, with a surprising length. It will pair wonderfully with fish, white meat, tapas, goat cheese, or you can just enjoy it on its own! Serve at 12Â°C. Ageing potential of 5 years.
Fresh and fruity modern-style red with a touch of wood that gives a Brambly spiciness

product.productName: Arc du RhÃ´ne CÃ´tes du RhÃ´ne Villages -
product.productDescription: A rich, juicy, deeply fruity red from the southern RhÃ´ne. Lovely black fruit & softness
Tropical guava notes of Colombard allied with light, zippy freshness of Sauvignon. Perfect with seafood.
Appellation Touraine ContrÃ´lÃ©e

product.productName: Paul Mas Grenache/Syrah IGP Pays d'Oc South of France -
product.productDescription: Wine of France. Grenache - Syrah - Red French Wine. The Paul Mas vineyards are located in the Languedoc region of South of France, and are planted on the hillsides of the best wine-producing valleys of the region. This wine is a blend of Grenache Noir (60%) and Syrah (40%), coming from the Aude and HÃ©rault valleys. It is then aged in stainless steel tanks and partly in oak barrels. The nose is complex with aromas of cherry, violet and spices, as well as liquorice notes. It is a soft and balanced wine, with supple tannins. We recommend you to serve it with grilled meats, pasta dishes or game.

Wine of Spain. From organic vineyards. International Wine Challenge 2010 Bronze. Tempranillo - Red Spanish Wine. Made from organically grown Tempranillo grapes in the plain of La Mancha in central Spain. The fruit and oak character is a result of ageing in oak barrels.

Wine of Central Valley, Chile. Cabernet Sauvignon - Chilean Wine. Intense and full bodied with soft vanilla and fresh blackcurrant fruit character. Vineyard&Winemaking: From the Central Valley, where the Mediterranean climate and broad daily temperature extremes lead to intense, deeply coloured wines. Half of the wine was oak aged for 6 months for a lush mouthfeel and well-rounded character. Character: Aromas of cherries, cranberries, spice, tobacco, and vanilla precede the lively palate full of red fruit flavour with a touch of caramel. Family owned since 1870. Don Maximiano ErrÃ¡zuriz founded VinÃ¡ErrÃ¡zuriz in 1870. His descendants continue to seek out innovations to express the fullest potential of Chile's excellent growing conditions for creating fresh and exciting wines.

Wine of France. Coteaux des Baronnies - Red French Wine. The 'small but perfectly formed' Coteaux des Baronnies wine region lies on the edge of the RhÃ´ne Valley. Often overlooked due to the vast size of its neighbour, it produces some of the most undervalued winesin the entire region. This wine burst with ripe summer fruits, all backed up with herbs and spices and the hallmark peppery finish. Ideal with all roast meats especially beef but is equally enjoyable as a glass on its own if you like fuller flavoured wines.

product.productName: Waitrose Fairtrade South African Chenin Blanc -
product.productDescription: A deliciously crisp, fruity and dry Chenin from a Fairtrade vineyard in South Africa.

product.productName: ChÃ¢teau St Nicolas CÃ´tes du Roussillon -
product.productDescription: Wine of France. CÃ´tes du Roussillon - Red French Wine. This red CÃ´tes du Roussillon is made from low yields of Grenache Noir (60%), Syrah (30%) with 10% from old Carignan Noir vines, grown on clay-limestone soils and traditionally vinified. With all the hallmarks of classic Roussillon: red fruits laced with warm southern spice on the nose, fresh and supple, full-bodied and satisfying on the palate. Try with grilled meats, richer casseroles or perfect with soft French cheeses. ChÃ¢teau Saint Nicolas lies in the heart of the Roussillon region of south west France and has been tended by the same family for the last 300 years.
One of our top choices, silky and packed full of ripe fruit flavours. Try with salmon or tuna.
Concentrated fresh citrus fruits and white peaches on the palate. Long elegant finish.

product.productName: RÃ©serve des Hospitaliers Cairanne, CÃ´tes du RhÃ´ne-Villages, France -
product.productDescription: CÃTE DU RHÃNE VILLAGES. Cairanne village, north east of Orange sits in the heart of the RhÃ´ne, home of the 'Knight Hospitaliers de St. Jean' in the 12th century, who were sworn to assist in the defence of Jerusalem and specifically, to protect a hospital built in Jerusalem before the first crusade. Today, the village, with its ancient stone buildings, has an atmosphere of those medieval times. This Cairanne is made from quality Grenache and Syrah grapes that were picked at optimum ripeness. Aged in French oak barriques for nine months, the wine has developed a wonderful structure and richness. A deep cherry red hue and a moreish nose of vanillas, morello cherries, chocolate and a touch of clove spice truly tempts. Red cherry fruit and a twist of cinnamon and nutmeg finish this full flavoured RhÃ´ne red off beautifully. 13.5% vol.

product.productName: Champteloup Muscadet SÃ¨vre et Maine Loire, France -
product.productDescription: Crisp, fresh and a touch salty, this is a superb example of Muscadet. Classic support act for shellfish.

Wine of France. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans. Red French Wine. A blend of 50% Syrah, 40% Grenache and 10% Mourvedre, it comes primarily from the Plan de Dieu (Plain of God), which is situated northeast of Chateauneuf du Pape.
A smooth and ripely fruity blend of Shiraz and Pinotage from the team at Fairhills

product.productName: DomÃ¤ne Wachau 'Terraces' GrÃ¼ner Veltliner Wachau, Austria -
product.productDescription: Flavours of green plums with a sprinkling of warm cinnamon spice. Great accompaniment to light foods.

Wine of Saumur, France. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans. Cabernet Franc - Red French Wine. From vineyards planted on the south bank of the Loire around the historic castle town of Saumur, the Les NiviÃ¨res is made from 100% Cabernet Franc grapes grown on the sand and limestone slopes of the region. Specially vinified to bring out the rich blackcurrant and spice flavours so characteristic of the delicately balanced reds of the Loire Valley, this is a wine to enjoy in the full freshness of its youth.

product.productName: Moncaro Rosso Piceno Superiore Marches, Italy -
product.productDescription: A soft, velvety blend of Montepulciano and Sangiovese grapes. Match with rich spaghetti bolognese.

Wine of South Eastern Australia. Shiraz Cabernet - Red Australian Wine. The winemakers of Jacob's Creek have blended quality Shiraz and Cabernet Sauvignon grapes to create a medium bodied wine with ripe berry fruit flavours. A medium bodied wine boasting flavours of blackberry and plum with hints of pepper, smooth tannins and subtle oak. Enjoy with grilled steak, pizza or tomato based pasta dishes. Our winemaking tradition dates back to 1847 when Johann Gramp planted his first vineyard on the banks of Jacob's Creek. Bernard Hickin, Winemaker
A marvellously rich and creamy, soft-fruit style of white Rioja. Superb partner for quiche.
Fresh and aromatic white bursting with grapefruit and lime flavours. Fantastic with goat's cheese tarts.

Champagne of France. Laurent-Perrier Brut, Non-Vintage French Champagne. This elegant champagne is memorable for its freshness and finesse - a perfect introduction to the unique spirit of Laurent-Perrier. Laurent-Perrier Brut\u2019s style is defined by its very high proportion of Chardonnay which provides a natural purity, freshness and elegance. These essential characteristics, expressed in all our champagnes, are a good introduction to the spirit of Laurent-Perrier. By Appointment To H.R.H The Prince of Wales Purveyors of Champagne.

product.productName: Teruzzi & Puthod Rondolino Vernaccia di Gimignano, Tuscany, Italy -
product.productDescription: From an iconic Tuscan producer, elegant aromas of green apple. Matches perfectly with soft cheeses.

product.productName: Torre del Falco Nero di Troia Puglia, Italy -
product.productDescription: A fascinating wine from the Puglian hills, black-cherry fruit and spice. Try with fish like grilled sardines.

IbÃ©ricos Crianza Tempranillo - Red Spanish Wine. IbÃ©ricos takes its name from the Iberian Peninsula, a land of lonely oaks and ancient vineyards. This noble wine from the Torres family, made with the Tempranillo varietal, is aged for 12 months in oak barrels and for a long time in the bottle. Thus, the wine speaks to us of the land it comes from and its origins with aromas of forest fruits and spices. On the palate, it speaks to us of the passing of time, smooth, elegant and long. www.ibericosvino.com

product.productName: Oyster Bay Sparkling CuvÃ©e RosÃ© NV Hawke's Bay New Zealand -
product.productDescription: Oyster Bay wines capture the special character of New Zealand ...elegant, assertive wines with glorious fruit flavours.
Oyster Bay wines capture the special character of New Zealand ...elegant, assertive wines with glorious fruit flavours.

Wine of Swartland, South Africa. Syrah - Red South African Wine. Tasting Notes. Spicy, aromatic, rich, textured, French oaked and lingering. The Crested porcupines are widely represented in Southern Africa. They are covered in spines and quills which when raised present a formidable fence of sharp spikes. They are noisy animals and move with a ponderous gait accompanied by much snuffling and grunting. A diet of potatoes, pumpkin and root vegetables tend to make them a problem in farming areas. They are, however, nocturnal and shy and the families that reside at Boekenhoutskloof are very welcome.

product.productName: Jean-Luc Colombo La Redonne CÃ´tes du RhÃ´ne -
product.productDescription: A deliciously fresh and floral dry white from 70% Viognier & 30% Marsanne.

Blanc de Blancs is made exclusively from Chardonnay grapes. Only juice from the first pressing is used for elegance and finesse. A fresh fruity style of Champagne with nutty complexity which is an ideal aperitif.

Enriched with calcium and vitamins. Dairy free. Naturally low in saturated fat. Contains healthy oat fibre - good for your heart. Delicious both hot and cold. Low in fat. No artificial stabilisers or preservatives. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans. Not surprisingly, we love oats! We love the fact that oats have been around for a long time helping people to eat well naturally. Oats are full of fibre and give our body what it needs in just the right balance. Oats contain soluble oat fibre which is proven to be good for your heart when eaten regularly. Oatly is made from pure oats straight from the field ... ( no cows involved !). Delight in the great taste of Oatly oat drink every time you cook, bake, have a bowl of cereal or reach for a refreshing drink. Our Secret. Oatly's products are manufactured using a unique patented process, the result of a research partnership with Lund University in Sweden. Oatly isthe only oat drink of its kind in the world which retains the soluble fibre called beta-glucan which is found naturally in oats. Regular consumption of beta-glucan as a part of a balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle, contributes to maintenance of normal blood cholesterol concentrations. Recipes and information: www.oatly.co.uk, info@oatly.co.uk
Suitable for vegetarians. Milk (74%) drink with the unique taste of MarsÂ®

product.productName: Rice Dream original rice drink + calcium -
product.productDescription: Naturally light taste. Low in fat. International Taste&Quality Institute, Brussels - superior taste award. All natural ingredients - no stabilisers or emulsifiers. The original rice drink - first introduced more than 30 years ago. Easy to digest as naturally lactose free. No added sugars, only contains natural occurring sugars. Low in fat. Source of calcium and vitamins D2&B12. Made with Italian rice. Lactose, dairy, soya , gluten and wheat free. Suitable for vegans and kosher diets. Vegetarian Society Approved. Have a Rice Dream Day! A delicious and refreshing alternative to dairy and soya milk. Incorporating Rice Dream into your healthy lifestyle could not be easier. The light and fresh taste complements everyone's daily routine. Whether pouring on your breakfast cereal, incorporating in a scrumptious family meal, adding to your pick-me-up cup of coffee or simply used as a refreshing drink, Rice Dream can be enjoyed by all. Rice Dream + Calcium provides you with as much calcium as cow's milk. Not only that, the added vitamin D2 helps your body absorb calcium more easily!*. *As part of a balanced diet and healthy lifestyle. Have you tried Rice Dream Vanilla&Oat Dream? Rice Dream Vanilla Organic. Oat Dream Original. For delicious recipes, competitions and news visit mydairydream.com. For further advice visit mydairyfreedream.com. For more information: http//gda.ciaa.eu/. Get social and join our friendly online community! Twitter: @dairyfreedream. Facebook: facebook.com/mydairyfreedream

Source of protein. Low in saturated fat. Source of calcium and vitamins: B2, B12, D2. All the goodness of Alpro Soya Chocolate! Soya alternative to milk. A delightful fresh chocolate taste. Chocolate Flavour Milkshake Mix with added Vitamins and Minerals to complement milk. Turn milk into a delicious drink with NESQUIK. With no artificial colours, flavours, sweeteners or preservatives, NESQUIK contains Vitamin D, essential to help the body absorb the calcium in milk for the development of healthy bones in kids, as part of a healthy, balanced diet and lifestyle. Soil Association Organic food Awards Gold - 2013. Contains natural sugars from rice. Dairy and gluten free. Unsweetened. Whole grain. Low-fat, low salt. Non-GM. No artificial anythings. Vegetarian Society approved. Kosher - KLBD. Pure pleasure. Enjoy the delicacy of Italian brown rice with all its fibre, balanced with pure mountain spring water and cold-pressed sunflower oil. Silky white and subtly sweet (naturally so), this is the only rice drink made with whole-grain, brown rice. Virtuous and velvety. Hello! Ar Rude Health, we choose the best of the best ingredients and put them together in ways that make their natural flavours sing. No need to fortify or falsify. No need to mess with the planet. With great food inside us, we feel we can do just about anything. Eat right, stay brilliant. P.S. You're in rude health when... You eat muffins but don't look like one. You know your glutes from your gluten. You make lunch, not war. If you can stop yourself from guzzling the lot, you can also use Brown Rice Drink to make a chocolate ganache or creamy custard, leaving time to lick the spoon clean. If You're fond of cakes or muffins, why not bake our moist, banana-fuelled Breakfast Oat Loaf with Brown Rice Drink? We toss in a heap of The Oatmeal too. Hungry for more ideas? We put the best of the rest here rudehealth.com/recipes. Food for thought. What we leave out is just as important as what we put it. Organic. Dairy-free. Unsweetened. Whole grain. Heart healthy. Low-fat, low-salt. Contains natural sugars from oats. No artificial anythings. Non-GM. Vegetarian Society approved. Kosher - KLBD. Pure Pleasure. Get all the goodness of oats the easy way, any time, any place. This drink is made with whole grains, soluble fibre and all, shown to help keep your heart in rude health when eaten regularly. The satisfying oaty flavour is subtly balanced with pure mountain spring water and a touch of cold-pressed sunflower oil. Comfort you can drink. Heart Healthy. Regularly eating the soluble fibre in oats, known as beta-glucan, contributes to maintaining normal cholesterol levels. One 250ml glass of Oat Drink provides a third (1g) of the daily requirement of beta-glucan. Hello! product.productName: Oxford Landing Estates RosÃ© South Australia -
product.productDescription: Wine of Australia. RosÃ©Australian Wine

Wine of Hungary. Pinot Noir - RosÃ©Hungarian Wine. This rosÃ©has been developed in co-operation with professional chefs in order to provide a harmonious balance to the intense flavours found in pan-Asian, Caribbean and Central American cuisine. Produced from native and international grape varieties, Pinot Noir and KÃ©kfrankos, the ripe, fresh, red fruit notes combined with the wine's subtle berry fruit aroma, compliment these complex spice combinations and stand up to the heat of spicy hot dishes. Serve chilled.

Wine of Mendoza, Argentina. Malbec - RosÃ©Argentinian Wine. Deep pink color. Aromas of strawberries and cherries. Excellent balance between sweetness and acidity. Ideal partner to sushi and smoked salmon. Facebook /fincaflichman

product.productName: Zalze Cabernet Sauvignon/Shiraz RosÃ© - South Africa -
product.productDescription: Cherry and plum aromas with a vibrant, lively character. Try on its own or with fresh fruit.

product.productName: Morland Old Speckled Hen ale in cans -
product.productDescription: A distinctive rich malty taste bursting with character, fruity aroma&deliciously smooth. First brewed to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the MG Car factory and affectionately named after an old MG Car used as a factory runaround -. 'The OWLD Speckled UN'. A satisfying, finely balanced ale, with a smooth, rich malty taste. Perfect for every occasion. Great with friends and food.

Kronenbourg 1664 is the UK's No. 2 premium lager, originating in Alsace in Eastern France. Made with selected malts and exclusive yeast, Kronenbourg 1664 is a darkish beer with golden highlights. Its aromatic hoppiness and subtle bitterness come from long maturation in the cellar. Its unique recipe is distinguished by the use of the aromatic Strisselspalt hop, which setsit apart from other beers. The Strisselspalt hop has been exclusive to Alsace since 1885 and gives the beer an unrivalled aroma and superior taste.

Only the best quality pears. A refreshing taste. There Method in the MagnersÂ®. Here at Magners we go to unusual lengths to bring you our distinctive tasting Pear cider. The only fruit we use on our Pear Cider is Pears, Pears and.... Pears! For more info, visit us at www.magners.com or join us at twitter and facebook

Refreshing crafted beer. Crafted by the master brewer of""Old Speckled Hen"", this light golden beer delivers both flavour and refreshment. Brewed using the finest pale malts and the rare galaxy hop to give a light golden colour, subtle tropical fruit notes and a deliciously smooth finish.
S.A. Gold is a full-flavoured, hoppy and refreshing golden ale. Hops are added late in the brewing process giving it complex and refreshing citrus aromas and flavours.
Distinctive and long on refreshment, Deuchars IPA combines delicious dry hop flavours with hints of fresh citrus and a delicate floral finish.

product.productName: Old Speckled Hen Strong Fine Ale -
product.productDescription: A finely balanced ale, with a smooth, rich malty taste perfect for every occasion. Why not try with your Sunday roast or cured meats and cheese.

Created by William Magner in 1935, Magners Original Irish Cider is an authentic premium cider made in Ireland. A blend of seventeen varieties of apples creates the unique, distinctive and refreshing taste.
A pale golden ale with a crisp and fuity taste.

product.productName: Badger Brewery Blandford Fly Ale with Ginger -
product.productDescription: A bite of spicy ginger. With the hot summer sun beating down, the patient fly-fishermen of the Dorset Stour await their catch. These 'Flyers' are celebrated in this warming ale with ginger overtones, rumoured to be originally included to remedy the bites of the infamous Blandford Fly. The rounded sweetness of this medium-bodied brew makes it an ideal and refreshing accompaniment to a hot lamb biryani or spicy crispy chilli beef. See - Golden amber. Smell - Ginger, spicy, toffee. Taste - Sweet, refreshing, ginger spice

Gloriously peachy. On a crisp winter's day, a cloudless sky fills the Dorset coastline with sunshine. Above a White-tailed Eagle can be seen soaring above the sea - the silhouette of its majestic wings a sign that Spring is near. This is the perfect time to enjoy the deliciously balanced peach and melon flavours of this award-winning classic. An ideal complement to sticky bbq ribs or an indulgent vanilla cheesecake. See - Amber bronze. Smell - Peaches, nectarines, floral. Taste - Zesty, peaches, balanced sweetness

product.productName: Fuller's Honey Dew Golden Organic Beer -
product.productDescription: An award winning, organically produced premium beer that's delightfully sweet, golden and refreshing.
A rich and distinctive chocolate beer, bottle conditioned for extra flavour.

FRUIT BEER (Grapefruit). A premium wheat beer base combines with zesty, pithy grapefruit to produce a subtle citrus after-taste. Superbly refreshing! Contains grapefruit flavouring. Brewed with skill and patience in one of Britain's finest small breweries. HISTORICAL NOTES. St. Peter's Brewery is located in a medieval hall in a remote and beautiful corner of Suffolk. There our beers begin their lives deep below the brewery with water drawn from a pure source - as it has been for over 700 years, essential for the full flavour and pure character of all St. Peter's beers. Our beautiful flask-shaped oval bottle is a faithful copy of one produced c.1770 for Thomas Gerrard of Gibbstown, just across the Delaware River from Philadelphia. The original is now kept at St. Peter's Hall and is a rare example of an oval Eighteenth Century beer bottle. 2.35 UK units of alcohol per bottle. ALC. 4.7% VOL.
One of the oldest estates in the region. Silky tannin structure. Great with game.
Notes of violet and blackcurrant with fresh acidity and cherry burst. Wonderful with olive-infused dishes.

Waitrose Chianti Classico is made in partnership with Barone Ricasoli at Castello di Brolio in Chianti. The Ricasoli family was the first ever producer of Chianti and, as their continue to strive for top quality, are regarded amongst the best in Tuscany. Bright ruby red with a generous and enveloping bouquet, showing hints of violets, ripe berries and spices. The palate is full with a soft, velvety texture, demonstrating the potential grace and finesse of the Sangiovese grape. Best served with red meats, especially fillet steak, with grilled vegetables and roast potatoes.
Valpolicella Ripasso Classico Superiore
One of Italy's most prestigious red wines, from an ancient vine variety. Best enjoyed with grilled meats.
A perfect example of Amarone with briary fruit and chocolate notes. Try with baked aubergine.

Castello di Brolio \u2013 Italian Red Wine. With this harvest, it was finally possible for the Sangiovese to express its maximum potential. Of an intense ruby colour with garnet tinges, it has a good aromatic complex bouquet. Chocolate/coffee and spices palate, it possesses and elegant tannin content and a lingering finish. Very rigid winter days with temperatures often below zero (minimum registered: -11Â°C 5th January), until March. April and May were quite rainy with average temperature around 11-12Â°degrees. The growing phase of the grape-vine started again with the opening of the buds taking place at the end of April, the flowering took place regularly in the month of May. The summer months were mild (20Â°C-24Â°C) with scarce rainfall. Then, around the 20th August, there was a net turnabout: warm, sunny days marked the last decade of the month, all September and the first fortnight on October. A set of much longed-for factors making it possible for the grapes to reach a perfect maturation. The harvest started in the beginning of September with Merlot followed by Sangiovese as from 20th September.
A delicious Barolo with elegant rose and tea flavours and fine tannins. A treat with richly-sauced meat.

INDICAZIONE GEOGRAFICA TIPICA. 13% vol. Climate Vintage: The beginning of spring saw a good amount of rain and slightly higher temperatures than the seasonal average, which favoured a slight anticipation of the budding phase. In the following period, average temperatures and rainfall led to excellent flowering and vegetative cycle. Rains at the beginning of summer maintained a good plant growth equilibrium which lasted throughout the month of August. Notwithstanding the high day temperatures, nights were cool and assured the full ripening of all grape varieties. As a result, the ripening of the grapes proceeded optimally, guaranteeing the presumptionof an excellent harvest.
Deep, dark and rich with wonderful cherry and spice flavours and lingering finish
